dtliExcerpt: Josh Groban and Annaleigh Ashford bring their own distinctive qualities to Stephen Sondheim's masterpiece, in a production that emphasizes the musical's intimate psychological horror over Grand Guignol theatrics.
bwwExcerpt: With his boyish good looks, and despite a burly beard,Mr. Groban appears young for the role, looking scarcely older than Anthony ( Jordan Fisher), the sailor who rescued Sweeney when their ship heading to England foundered.
